titleStmt.title: Vindiciæ Carolinæ, or, A defence of Eikon basilikē, the portraicture of His Sacred Majesty in his solitudes and sufferings in reply to a book intituled Eikonoklastes, written by Mr. Milton, and lately re-printed at Amsterdam.
titleStmt.author: Hollingworth, Richard, 1639?-1701.
Wilson, John, 1626-1696.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.L. for Luke Meredith ...,

notesStmt.note: BM also ascribes the work to John Wilson, playwright and author of "A discourse of monarchy."
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
